Package projects.spatial.knnutils

Class KNNComparator<T extends KDPoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • projects.spatial.knnutils.KNNComparator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A KDPoint type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Comparator<T>
    public class KNNComparator<T extends KDPoint>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<T>, java.io.Serializable

    KNNComparator is a Serializable Comparator used for sorting KDPoints based on the distanceSquared to an anchor KDPoint. It is very useful for testing KNN queries.

    Note: this comparator imposes orderings that are inconsistent with KDPoint.equals(Object).

    YOU SHOULD ***NOT*** EDIT THIS CLASS! If you do, you risk not passing our tests!

    Author:
    Jason Filippou
    See Also:
    NNData, Serialized Form
